channel.title: Connected to update server
channel.description: So I searched Dkk's 662 and 657 client.java files, and I couldn't find where to put my IP so that my friends can connect to my server. When my friends try to connect to me server, they get the screen on the client that says "Connected to update server" If you have an solutions, I would greatly appreciate it. Also, my friend is having a problem when he runs the client for 32 bit. The error says "Error_game_js5io".

item.title: Connected to update server
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

do you use no-ip?? and the server ip is probably located in client.java all you have to do is search “127.0.0.1”… If im wrong… then sucks, I really don’t code anything 474 +

Read full topic

item.title: Connected to update server
item.dc:creator: @freddie11234 freddie11234
item.description:
@freddie11234 wrote:

So I searched Dkk’s 662 and 657 client.java files, and I couldn’t find where to put my IP so that my friends can connect to my server. When my friends try to connect to me server, they get the screen on the client that says “Connected to update server” If you have an solutions, I would greatly appreciate it.
Also, my friend is having a problem when he runs the client for 32 bit. The error says “Error_game_js5io”.
